name: MySQL5
queryCode:
SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) <= 1 THEN '0-1天'
        WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) > 1 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) <= 2 THEN '1-2天'
        WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) > 2 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) <= 5 THEN '2-5天'
        WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) > 5 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) <= 7 THEN '5-7天'
        WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) > 7 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) <= 15 THEN '7-15天'
        WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) > 15 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) <= 30 THEN '15-30天'
        WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, T1.CREATE_TIME, T1.UPDATE_TIME) > 30 THEN '30天以上'
        END AS filter_type,
    COUNT(*) AS count
FROM work_item T1
WHERE T1.UPDATE_TIME IS NOT NULL and T1.WORK_ITEM_TYPE_ID LIKE '%BUG%' AND PROJECT_ID = #{ctx.webcontext.project}
GROUP BY filter_type;
